title: Ornn ult bug
body: just played a game with ornn and followed it by going into the practice tool. everytime i tried to hit his ult back it would just go right through me regardless of when i timed it. it seems to happen after youve leveled up his ult to at least 2 or 3. the ram also seems to be moving much slower than normal

replies.body: It may be latency connection problems or pc specs?Ornn is a bit buggy where he's been turned invisible. If it's moving slower than normal, than you just gotta hit it far ahead of the time from deceiving visuals if fast, then you gotta hit late like after the entire ram passes you but if it's at least lvl 2 or 3 ult then maybe you shouldn't put any more points into his ult.
